title: Constitutional checks on executive in Nig., Mex.

content.prompt: The role of the executive in Nigeria is similar to that of the executive in Mexico in which of the following ways?

choices.label: The executive is limited to a single term in office.
The legislature has a constitutional check on the executive.
The executive presides over a unitary system of government.
The legislature can remove the executive with a vote of no confidence.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
